about_the_game:
The soundtrack of 'rotatePDF: A Corporate Tale' in original MIDI format - plus sheet music. If you would like to support the developer after having played the main game and get a little trinket in return, this is for you!

Additionally to the tracks listed, including sheet music for:
  • Credits Theme
  • Optional Bossa
  • Cue - Solved a Puzzle
  • Cue - Shock!

name: rotatePDF: The Official MIDI Soundtrack
short_description: The soundtrack of 'rotatePDF: A Corporate Tale' in original MIDI format - plus sheet music! Get your finest soundfonts and enjoy this tiny little gem of Indie music.
